website_summaries.verdict: Wooden kitchen that's the perfect size for young toddlers, but durability may be an issue.
pros: Large red dials are easy to turn
Sink can be removed for cleaning
cons: Doors can fall off during rough play

website_summaries.verdict: While the Hape Playfully Delicious kitchen is sturdy and neat, it may be better for very small toddlers since it is a basic set.
pros: The Hape Playfully Delicious Gourmet Kitchen is a basic set that includes a stove, sink, oven and cabinet
It is made from plywood and MDF and the paint is child-safe
It is also compact and suitable for a smaller space
cons: Although assembly is easy, the Hape kitchen doesn't come with any accessories, and does not have as many features as other kitchen sets

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but it's small
customer_reviews.text: I like the simplicity of this play kitchen, and it fits nicely in my daughters bedroom. It is very small though, maybe it's just me but it seems like she will outgrow it by the time she is 3 (she is 18 months now). Like it said, it is very simple so if that is what you are looking for it is perfect. I think it is a little overpriced for what it is, however. She does love it though and has been playing with it non-stop. Make sure to secure it to the wall, because it is very light and can be tipped over easily.
customer_reviews.author: KirFri123

customer_reviews.title: This is the first Hape product I've been remotely disappointed by. The fiberboard shelves give off a strong ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the first Hape product I've been remotely disappointed by. The fiberboard shelves give off a strong adhesive odor, and there's no indoor air quality certification (e.g. greenguard, carb) to assure you of its safety. This is really poor on Hape's part.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Bloom

customer_reviews.title: Small, sturdy, lovely.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Just what I wanted. I ordered the pots and dishes too. Waiting for those to arrive. My daughter just turned 1 and she is obsessed. We are moving to a bigger house and i will get her the fridge as well. Love how dainty and lovely it is. Hape did not disappoint . My kitchen did not come with the oven holes but I didn’t care. If anything i am glad because little hands can get stuck.
customer_reviews.author: AKM

customer_reviews.title: Recommend. Solid,  non toxic,  fun.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. When you open the box, it smells like wood, not glue, not MDF, etc. It's primarily plywood, but very light with nice sanded corners. It was easy to build, maybe 30-45 minutes taking my time. All the holes aligned well, the screws were correctly identified and threaded well. Highly recommend, my daughter (and wife) love it!
customer_reviews.author: Curt S. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Cute kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has loved this. The quality is good and it is adorable! No complaints to speak of. Would be good if it had a few inter active sounds or lights, but also good as is. I added a touch light to the oven so she could see what is cooking. It is on the small side, which is great for our space & her but maybe a bit small for older children.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: We Love It!
customer_reviews.text: We all love this little kitchen, super sturdy and cute. Ours was missing the faucet (super bummer when we were setting it up Christmas Eve) But our toddler didn't even notice, and Hape was an amazing company to work with and they shipped a new one out to us right away! This has been the perfect blend of a great sturdy functional toy and one that looks great too!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: the cutest kitchen for your kids to have
customer_reviews.text: appealing to see in a room and small enough for their imagination to run wild. this wooden toy is everything you want to have for your kids. easy to assemble and the wooden parts are just too cute. highly recommend this product. my girls are six and four and they still play with this after 3 years of having in our house.
customer_reviews.author: Aydan

customer_reviews.title: My children love it. As do their cousins and friends
customer_reviews.text: This Kitchen set will be an heirloom toy. My children love it. As do their cousins and friends. Effortless to assemble and for the children to use. Everyone from our 7 year old niece to our 20 month old daughter happily plays together. Any larger and our daughter wouldn't be able to reach the shelves. Even kneeling next to it or sitting as an adult is comfortable and fun to play with. Nice to have someone 'feeding' me for a change.
customer_reviews.author: AGROVER

customer_reviews.title: Perfect young toddler kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift for my 14 month old daughter. I assembled it easily with no power tools. When she saw this kitchen set, my daughter immediately knew what it was and went to work playing with it, opening doors, putting things on the stove, in the sink, on the shelf. It has been 6 months and she still loves it! She loves to cook just like mommy It is a perfect height for a one-year-old to start and grow with. We bought the gourmet kitchen set with it and it matches perfectly. We later added the fridge because she loves this piece so much! I've never been disappointed with the quality and durability of Hape products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and attractive for a small space
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our 18 month old daughter for Christmas. She's a little short so the height is nice for her. She plays with it a little more as she gets older. There's not much counter space but she loves to take items in and out of the cabinets and "cut up" her play food. I wanted something with a small footprint so I could keep it in our kitchen and she could "play kitchen" while I made dinner...overall I'm pleased with how it looks, the size, and how it's held up in the first few months of use. My husband didn't find it too challenging to assemble and everything fit together in a sturdy way.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Good Looks and the Right Size.
customer_reviews.text: This is going to an 18 month old child. I see nothing that could possibly make it unsafe for under 3 years old. This is a very attractive item. There's no comparison to other 'kitchens' in looks and materials. Only complaint is the right side door sticks at the bottom, making it difficult to open and close. I didn't realize this flaw until I had the thing completely assembled. My husband made an adjustment to the little pivoting hinge and it is only a little less sticky, but still. After putting it together, you can hardly send it back for such a minor problem. Wish it worked as smoothly as the left one does.
customer_reviews.author: D. Dingle

customer_reviews.title: really cool toy for my 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: kiddo loves this thing. went together easily and quickly. well manufactured and everything fit perfectly. I bought the pots and pans set that suggested to come with it since it doesn't come with any, goes with it perfectly. add some fake food and its really awesome. my 3 year old asks what I want to eat, then pretends to make me whatever she wants! I'd highly recommend this brand. They're a bit pricey but worth it to not buy plastic crap.
customer_reviews.author: fuzzbuster

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, made with non-toxic materials, cute and fun but still with a tasteful look
customer_reviews.text: I adore this play kitchen, and my son loves it. It's really great quality, the doors open and close nicely, and the knobs actually turn. It's on the smaller side, which I like because it can fit nicely in my actual kitchen and it can easily be moved. I also like this company because they have high standards in terms of offgassing and not using toxic paints or adhesives.
customer_reviews.author: emilyratz

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 1.5 year old a few months ago. She loved it immediately and still plays with it daily. Other little kids who come over love it as well. I liked the interactive features - that the stove knobs turn and click, the sink knobs also turn, that there are shelves in both lower compartments for storing all the kitchen pots, fake food, etc. Surprisingly, my daughter loved the upper shelf. She enjoys putting the plates into their grooves, putting the "milk" up there. Very happy I spent the extra money for this. It is holding up to lots of wear and tear, too.
customer_reviews.author: Lena Ellison

customer_reviews.title: Great well made compact play kitchen - perfect for apartment
customer_reviews.text: Great, well-made, compact play kitchen. My 2 year old absolutely loves it and has loved it since we got it for him about 6 months ago. It is beautifully constructed and designed and compact enough to fit in our New York City apartment. The knobs actually click like they are real and the oven doors open and close very cleanly. It does come bare so you will most likely want some accessories to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: ekoppp

customer_reviews.title: Rip off- small for pets not even 1 year olds
customer_reviews.text: Horrid and made for pets not kids. This is clearly a scam. It’s so small not even a one year old could play with it. Lame and flimsy!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Luning

customer_reviews.title: Love this little kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Love this little kitchen. We purchased this for our 18 month old son to see if he was into it before investing in a bigger kitchen. We also wanted one that was wood and looked good in our home. He is a huge fan and I think we are going to just buy the refrigerator for Christmas and forego any larger or more elaborate kitchen. There is plenty of cabinet space in this one. Assembly was very straightforward (I did it alone in about 20-30 minutes). It is very stable. Overall highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Lovely kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this play kitchen and so do I! It's sturdy, well made and looks great! We gave this to my son for his 1st birthday and although he is a bit too young to understand 'playing house' he has already played with this for many hours, opening and closing doors, putting things in and out of the oven, removing the sink bucket and dropping things into the sink hole - I know we will get many years of joy out of this!
customer_reviews.author: LaB

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: They had one just like it at our public library. It seems sturdy and has held up very well at our local library with a lot of different kids using it every day. Love the product.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Encourage Creative & Independent Play with Simple Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This kitchen is amazing! We researched for hours before settling on this particular one and I am so glad we did. A year later it has held up VERY well. The top wipes clean easily. I do wish there was more "counter space" for different appliances/bowls/etc. It is the perfect size for a toddler. I love that it is fairly simple and encourages creative play. A great purchase & value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: JMS

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE it! My son is one (manufacturer recommended age is 3+) and loves being in the kitchen. I was just browsing play kitchens on amazon and had no intention on buying one, but when I saw this simple, wooden play kitchen, I knew I had to buy it! I think it's perfect for the younger toddler. Best of all: it was so easy to assemble! I think I'll be buying the fridge addition next.
customer_reviews.author: morgy_23

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love this kitchen, and so does my 17 month old son! We got it for him for Christmas, and I'm very happy with the quality. He has played with it a ton already. I wanted something that didn't take up too much space and that wasn't too expensive, and this one fit the bill. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect kitchen for a toddler!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and easy assembly! The wood pieces go together perfectly with easy to follow - (mostly picture) - instructions. The knobs on the sink faucets and stove knobs turn and click. This made for a super cute Christmas gift, along with the fridge and pots and pans. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: EOshaun

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small space.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to get my son a play kitchen, but couldn't imagine ANOTHER toy in the house. He really loves all his friends play kitchens, so I went on a search for a small one that would fit in a designated space that was about 2 feet wide. Well, it fits perfectly. It was easy to assemble, really nice quality and my son is loving it. Highly recommend for anyone that needs a compact version of a play kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Amy Tanzanite

customer_reviews.title: Nice size for me
customer_reviews.text: I want one sturdy which my kids can use a long time, and suitable size that won’t take up too much space. It’s just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: linlinkuo39

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size!
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to put together, overall I would say it took me about 30 minutes. It's the perfect size for my almost 3 year old daughter. If you don't have a lot of room in your house but still want your child to enjoy having a play kitchen you *need* to get this kitchen for your little one!
customer_reviews.author: C. Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Terrific buy! This was a gift for our preschool ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrific buy! This was a gift for our preschool aged daughter. It was simple to put together out of the box and has been very sturdy in 6+ months of frequent (sometimes harsh) use. The swing-open doors fit properly on the frame and close correctly. We later bought the coordinating dishes see and are very pleased with the quality and look of this item!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment!
customer_reviews.text: Gives you the desired effect of a play center kitchen without using up a ridiculous amount of space! My grandson loves it, it was simple to assemble with in minutes it was ready to go, Not hours!!
customer_reviews.author: barb

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put togather
customer_reviews.text: I whipped this baby togather while my husband kept saying "ill help in a minute" which is pretty much how long it took to assemble. Needless to say i got it finished before he could help. I was kind of worried that it would take forever when i saw all of the pieces and the diagram-style instructions, But it was really simple. it seems sturdy enough... for now. We shall see how it hold up. it is also light weight-ish ... making it easy to move from place to place.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken....
customer_reviews.text: I love this kitchen, but putting this together Christmas eve as a gift and the knobs are messed up and one is broke! Waiting to hear of the company will do anything for us.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Benedict

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen for small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little kitchen - nice materials, easy to put together, simple design. It's perfect for smaller spaces where you don't want a giant plastic monstrosity of a kitchen. Both my children (ages 1 & 4) love it, but I will say that it's probably better for shorter kids. Mine are on the tall side and my 4yo has a hard time with it being a little *too* small for her.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This little kitchen was perfect for what I was looking for! Its little knobs make clicking sounds, the shelf holds my little one's pots and the cabinet holds the food she "cooks" with. It is SO easy to put together. All with a hexkey. And a few months later it is still together and holding up to daily use and abuse. It is a little smaller than other plastic kitchens, but I wanted something small she could use near me while I was cooking. Perfect toy. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: min

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: “This things high quality girl” said my husband while putting it together :)
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Great for a 2 year old!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the kitchen, fridge and starter play set. My 2 two year old is in LOVE with the whole set. She can turn the knobs and pretend to wash her hands. I like it because it is small enough to fit under a kitchen window and is a plain wood. It was pretty easy to assemble. and nothing arrived damaged. very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: kjv

customer_reviews.title: Great Kitchen for Little Boys!
customer_reviews.text: We searched and searched for a good gender neutral kitchen for our son who loves to help mommy cook. This one is the perfect size, it tucks away easily (as opposed to those giant plastic monstrosities) and is very unassuming in the living room. We feel good about the safety of the Hape line and I love how cute all the little wooden accessories are with it! Not to mention they're holding up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Amamom

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and well made
customer_reviews.text: This kitchen set is so well made and absolutely adorable. As soon as we put it together my one year old grandson started playing with it. The size is perfect for little ones and all the parts and handles are easy to manipulate.
customer_reviews.author: Shana Van B

customer_reviews.title: Very well made!
customer_reviews.text: For Christmas for my 2 year old granddaughter. It is perfect and she lives it!
customer_reviews.author: Elsa M

customer_reviews.title: The perfect little kitchen for our 16-month old
customer_reviews.text: The perfect little kitchen for our 16-month old. Looks cute in our real (small, Brooklyn) kitchen and doesn't take up too much space. The clicking "burner" knobs on the stove are very fun for him, as is the faucet. You can hang utensils from the little slats in the shelf and there's ample space inside for crates of pretend food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: It's a cute little set, but the assembly instructions (or lack thereof) were horrible. The parts were not labeled and there was no written instruction to follow. The picture instructions provided skipped steps and were not clear. If you're pretty handy I guess maybe the above isn't a huge deal, but a master builder I am not. Haha.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I teach preschool so I know what to look for.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and well made, has a "real working feel", attractive to children but not garish. You get tired of something garish that feels intrusive in the room, and children tire of that too. The Hape feels good, feels "real" to children.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Dudley

customer_reviews.title: well loved gift!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this. My friend had one and my (at the time) 18 month old was obsessed. at 2.5 she still loves playing with it. my now 1 year old loves playing with it too. well made, cute and worth the money. solid product. Purchased Hape - Playfully Delicious - plates, pots, fork, knive. works great together. highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bec

customer_reviews.title: Small kitchen for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you pay attention to the dimensions! It is quite small for the price. I love Hape items but was disappointed to find out this is made in China. I thought all Hape items were made in Germany, my fault for assuming this.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie K

customer_reviews.title: Assembly was easy - cute kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute wooden toy kitchen. No issues with assembly, arrived in perfect condition. I do wish all the pieces were made of plywood instead or particle board but the unit is sturdy. I purchased for my 21 month old son as a deal of the day. I probably wouldn't spend $130 but it's well worth the DOD price to have a small kitchen that's more like furniture than one of the plastic kitchens.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Love this sweet little kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Love this sweet little kitchen! Got this for our youngest daughter for her 3rd birthday. I was looking for one that wasn't huge and/or obnoxious. I love the natural and simple look of this play kitchen. Also easy to put together!
customer_reviews.author: anordinarymom

customer_reviews.title: Really adorable, well made toy
customer_reviews.text: Really adorable, well made toy. Our toddler son loves to pretend to cook and he really enjoys this toy. It is better made than some prefab furniture I've bought in the past- not a single misaligned hole. The toy was very easy to put together- I'm a pediatrician and not very handy and I did it by myself in about 30 minutes. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: prev

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together. I love the gender neutral colors. It would be the perfect size for a 2-3yo. My son wanted a bigger set with sounds and lights so we are going to gift this to my niece, but he has loved playing with it the past year.
customer_reviews.author: JenRen

customer_reviews.title: Quality. Solid wood.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Solid toy made of solid wood. Doors and counter are composite/plastic-feel. Smaller than expected but adorable. Quality product that I feel good having my children use.
customer_reviews.author: CharlieBrown

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love it. Its well built
customer_reviews.text: We bought the kitchen with all the trimmings. Grandkids love it. Its well built. All wood. Only took about 20 minutes to put it together. This will last generations.
customer_reviews.author: otis pugh

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this kitchen after a lot of research. I bought it for my one year old, she is still a little young for it but already loves to play with it so I know it will be a favorite for a long time and that she will grow with it! It's adorable and yes a bit small, but by the time my daughter is 3 or 4 I will have her in my real kitchen with me!
customer_reviews.author: Avamama

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for our small space, kiddos play with it a lot. Easy to put together, they helped. It was smaller than I expected, but I like the size. Good buy for $80.
customer_reviews.author: kembchris

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grand daughter for Christmas. Its absolutely adorable and is sturdy as well. Its still holding up after tons of use. Its one of the toys that she always goes back to. I'd highly recommend it for its quality and styling
customer_reviews.author: Barbara C

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my 2yo for Christmas and she loves it. It is the perfect size for her and looks great next to our kitchen. I like that it doesn’t take up too much space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The cabinet corners are sharp and have caused a few bumps and bruises but he's getting more coordinated and it's been a great ad
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this kitchen! The cabinet corners are sharp and have caused a few bumps and bruises but he's getting more coordinated and it's been a great addition to the play area
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Good size & well made.
customer_reviews.text: 2nd purchase of the same kitchen for another grandchild. Not too big so it doesn't require a toy room of its own. Very easy to assemble & well made.
customer_reviews.author: AGB

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this for toddlers as it's little
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is nuts for this kitchen! She absolutely loves it & plays with it everyday!!! I highly recommend this for toddlers as it's little, but perfect for little ones or a tight space.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and fun
customer_reviews.text: This has been a hit with my toddler for over a year. The quality is nice and it doesn't take up too much space.
customer_reviews.author: alexandra large

customer_reviews.title: It's really small. We also have a kid kraft ...
customer_reviews.text: It's really small. We also have a kid kraft kitchen (don't ask... who needs 2 play kitchens? Smh) even for my 2.5 year old, it's teeny tiny.
customer_reviews.author: kpr

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner kitchen! It's petite enough for a small play space and a great size for our 18 month old. I love the simplicity of the kitchen as well. Definitely recommend for those seeking a nice first kitchen for their little one!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia B

customer_reviews.title: Play Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased for 15 month old with accessory food kits. Right size and keeps her engaged. She stays out of our kitchen more often and plays with his one which was goal. Very easy to assemble. Only problem is toy is still off gassing some funky smell. I'm guessing it's the chemical used in the press board or plywood. It's been four days since opened. Will update in future.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: So sweet!
customer_reviews.text: Sweet and simple, this play kitchen is sturdy and was very easy to put together. It's just right for a tot who loves pretend play; the clicking stove knobs and turning water taps are engaging, and otherwise it's all up to her imagination. I wish the starter set of matching pots, plates, and utensils was included, but the kitchen price was reasonable enough that I bought them separately.
customer_reviews.author: M. Casella

customer_reviews.title: Cute product unsure about durability
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this item when it first came. It is compact and my daughter enjoys playing with it so far. Only problem is, we have only had it for a few days and there is already paint chipping near the sink area. This is disheartening since I know this chip is onnly going to grow larger over time and makes me question the items durability. I would exchange for another of the same, except that taking this item apart and putting it back in its moderately large box will not be super or convenient since I live in the city and am car-free.
customer_reviews.author: tgr4y8

customer_reviews.title: Cute little kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Cute little kitchen, but REALLY small. With how small it is, I think it should be a little less expensive. Overall I do like the design of it though, and the colors are nice. Not too loud like some other ones.
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE this kitchen
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this kitchen. My daughter is 16 months and just starting to use her imagination so we decided to get her this kitchen and it is just perfect. Very please with the quality and my daughter keeps going back to play with it!
customer_reviews.author: Shannan Brengle

customer_reviews.title: Well made and fun
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion Hape makes the best and cutest kid’s kitchen toys. Great quality and not too garish with stickers or too many details. Well designed.
customer_reviews.author: therobotfamily

customer_reviews.title: going on 2 yrs and still like
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this, going on 2 yrs and still like new
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Perfect play kitchen for young toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Our boys (aged 14 months and 30 months) love this kitchen! It was easy to put together, looks nice and is sturdy (they have been playing with it non stop for 3 months and it still looks perfect). The only downside is that you need to buy accessories for it, and that can get a bit expensive
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful toy
customer_reviews.text: This is in the corner of the big kitchen, so when mom or dad cooks, so does our grandson. He is very busy. We also purchased additional kitchen gear, which he has incorporated and uses. He slams the doors, and the toy holds up well to less delicate use.
customer_reviews.author: LucyH

customer_reviews.title: but the kids LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: When I was first putting this together I thought is was crazy small, but the kids LOVE it!!!! Perfect size and we have 3-4 kids playing with it at once. Beautiful and stout.
customer_reviews.author: AARROW

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Super easy to assemble, perfect size for my 2 year old and very sturdy. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but that's a good thing. My 19 month old keeps pulling the ...
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I imagined, but that's a good thing. My 19 month old keeps pulling the sink out- I wish there were a way to secure it. Otherwise, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Suzie Glaser

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together and holds up well. Well made and very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Bruner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect kitchen!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect compact play kitchen! Although this is a small kitchen, compared to others on the market, all essentials are still present (sink, faucet, shelf, fridge, stove, oven). Easy to assemble and light weight. Only con is back piece is thin ply board and split in half when putting kitchen together
customer_reviews.author: Nicole L

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small apt
customer_reviews.text: My 1.5 Grandson loves this Kitchen! Perfect for a small apt. Perfect !
customer_reviews.author: SHEILA

customer_reviews.title: Great play kitchen for small living spaces
customer_reviews.text: This is a great play kitchen for small living spaces. It was easy to put together and has plenty of space in the cabinets for some play food and dishes. My kid really loves the sink too.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most frequently visited toy at home!
customer_reviews.author: OMGY

customer_reviews.title: hape is the best!
customer_reviews.text: The craft quality is very smooth, light weight, and safe for kids. The design is very cute too, not too big, perfect for a small space. My 2 yo son loves it! we have several Hape products and they always delivery good quality products!
customer_reviews.author: frequent flyer

customer_reviews.title: Love your products
customer_reviews.text: Hape ypu never let me dowm. Thanks for te replacement part free of charge. Love your products!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S.

customer_reviews.title: German craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: Took about 20 minutes to put together. Sturdy and solid little kitchen set, comes well packaged. Pretty light weight despite being solid wood (it's not a dense wood) which makes it easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: PrettySureYoureWrong

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and lots of fun for the imagination.
customer_reviews.text: Grandsons love it. They have pots, cooking utensils, dishes and various play foods which enhances their play. A real keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent size for 1-2 yr old. Easy to assemble (@1 hr). Corners of doors are a bit sharp and with it made for 1-2 yr olds I sometimes get nervous and wish the corners were a bit more curved.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful kitchen for my 19 month old. He cooks everyday. I easily put it together while he napped. Took me 2hrs or less. My son has stood on top of it to look out the window a few times. He's pretty rough with it & it still looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Nice to look at. Colors are not obnoxious like some other play kitchens. It is very small but it fits perfect in our space. 3 year old and 1 year old love it!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy Assembly!
customer_reviews.text: I feel compelled to review how easy this is to put together-it took me less than an hour by myself. I see horror stories of toys taking forever to put together and this one has great instructions. Hopefully my daughter likes it when Santa drops it off :-)
customer_reviews.author: Lizzard

customer_reviews.title: Good size for our 19 months GD
customer_reviews.text: Good size for our 19 months GD. The product is well made. Looks cute and along with the fridg it does not take too much space. We had a good experience with Pidoko kids and Amazon. Looking forward to many hours of fun for her and joy to see her for us.
customer_reviews.author: Lady in Red

customer_reviews.title: This kitchen is wonderful. Just the right size for my 15 month ...
customer_reviews.text: This kitchen is wonderful. Just the right size for my 15 month old and will get many years of use out of this well build kitchen. Very cute features. Plus, he just loves it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Brock Barnick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together - just wish the parts would have had the letters written on them
customer_reviews.author: Josephine A. Micciulla

customer_reviews.title: Our 2 year old and 4 year old love it!
customer_reviews.text: The quality is outstanding. My husband and I were surprised for the price we paid. Our 2 year old and 4 year old love it!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Geier

customer_reviews.title: Great for spatial cognitive skills
customer_reviews.text: My one year old absolutely loves it! It’s a great toy set for learning how to organize, fit in and other spatial cognition skills!
customer_reviews.author: maria paz

customer_reviews.title: cute
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this little kitchen. It does not come with any accessories just FYI. Instructions were horrible and out dated but worked out in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful play kitchen. Bought it for my grandbaby at 15 months and he adores it! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly R.

customer_reviews.title: Toddler gem
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this play kitchen along with the basic set of wooden pots and dishes for my home for when my toddler granddaughter sleeps over. I am very pleased with how it looks and her enjoyment of it. I love the simple design and am proud of myself for being able to assemble it on my own. At one point during the assembly there was a moment of frustration so I took a break and returned to the task the following day and it came together!
customer_reviews.author: Ciaonina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable and well made, totally worth the effort to put together!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I have a small house - so a small, but sturdier kitchen was a must. I didn't want a plastic kitchen that would fall over... my kid likes to play hard and inspect things. This was easy to put together. It came in one big box and my husband had it together in less than 30 minutes (part of that time was us ooo-ing and aww-ing over how cute everything was). The handles for the faucet spin (no noise) and the oven knobs turn and make clicking sounds. The oven door and under the sink door are heavy enough that they stay closed, but easy to open. Our girl loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Justyn VdP

customer_reviews.title: Still playing with it a year later.
customer_reviews.text: Had this almost a year and the girls still love playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: crackertroy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this! Pretty easy to assemble. Have had for almost a year and holding up great!
customer_reviews.author: Elliott and Rebecca Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Easy to assemble, nice quality, and fits perfectly in my son's very small room. This is one of the best things I have ever bought him. He is completely content playing with his own kitchen and staying out of mine. Mission accomplished.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loves this, and so does his mom ...
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this, and so does his mom because it's relatively compact and doesn't take up too much space.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Flint

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. Life like and lots of fun !
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen set
customer_reviews.text: it's a mini size of you kitchen your kids will learn what you do and mimic every single moves and will learn each of the names of the vegetables, and utilities of the kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Broligt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toddler sized kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 15 month old & it is the perfect size! Assembly was simple & it appears to be quite sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

product_meta.title: Hape Gourmet Kitchen Kid's Wooden Play Kitchen in White
product_meta.description: What's for dinner? The Playfully Delicious Gourmet Kitchen will help kids cook a variety of dishes with just a little imagination! Perfect for every little chef and baker, this kitchen features an oven, stovetop, sink, red knobs to turn the burners on and off, and a shelf to hold cooking utensils and ingredients. Encourages children to develop their creative thinking and fine motor skills while practicing basic cooking techniques. Pair with Hape's Playfully Delicious toy food sets and create mouthwatering meals for the whole family. Made from wood sourced from environmentally sustainably sourced forests. Durable child-safe paint finish and solid wood construction make this a toy your child will love for years to come. Hape's toys stimulate children through every stage of development and help nurture and develop their natural abilities. All Hape products sold in North America meet or exceed all applicable safety standards. The Gourmet Kitchen Play Set was named Toy of the Year by Parenting Magazine. It is also a proud recipient of the 2009 Canadian Toy Association "Hot" Toy Award and the 2012 Oppenheim Toy Portfolio Platinum Seal Award.
feature_bullets: Your child will be enchanted as they make their culinary masterpiece
Big red knobs provide a realistic experience for toddler fun
Encourages kinesthetic development as your child cognitively develops role play skills
Recommended for ages 3 years and up
Non-toxic finishes and child safe materials

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars500 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
